game.name: Unicorn Cake Cooking
game.description:
One of the latest free online cooking games to play, Unicorn Cake Cooking game is a treat to girls of all ages. In this highly exciting and challenging girls game, you are sure to learn the magical and easy-to-follow cake recipes by just following a few simple steps. When you are living in a magical world, then you should try something that is magical too. Getting engaged in this new cake recipe is sure to have huge fun and excitement.

Unicorn cake is a special recipe not a regular one. You can try this cool cooking game here and try the cake recipe on your own to appease your friends and family. Once you will taste it, you will try making it again and again at your home. The time has come when you have to show your amazing cooking skills to prepare the unicorn cake in the shortest possible time. All you need to focus on the tools available in the kitchen area, and the ingredients you have to use to prepare your delicious cake in this popular flash game for girls. 

Once your cake is properly cooked, your goal is to decorate it with the help of your creative skills. Choose the options perfectly to make it look like a real unicorn cake. Unicorn Cake Cooking game will not only help to improve your cooking skills, but it also give you a chance to show your creativity to the entire world. Use the ingredients to make a real culinary masterpiece and you are also sure to have a lot of fun. Good luck to complete the task timely and earn a high score!
